description: Deletes a channel message. Only admins can perform this action. Deletion makes messages inaccessible immediately. A background process deletes any revisions created by UpdateChannelMessage.

parameters.name: MessageId
parameters.description: The ID of the message being deleted.

parameters.name: ChimeBearer
parameters.description: The ARN of the AppInstanceUser or AppInstanceBot that makes the API call.

parameters.name: SubChannelId
parameters.description: The ID of the SubChannel in the request.
